scripts.serve: concurrently "npm run serve:server" "npm run serve:website" "npm run serve:colorpicker"
scripts.build:website: cd website && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:colorpicker: cd colorpicker && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:website && npm run build:colorpicker && npm run clean-dist && npm run build-dist
scripts.install: npm run install:server && npm run install:website && npm run install:colorpicker
scripts.build-dist: copyfiles website/dist/{,**/}* dist -a -u 2 && copyfiles colorpicker/dist/{,**/}* dist/colorpicker -a -u 2
